name: Paris Hill Tour
details: The Montmartre is a large hill located in Paris, in the 18th arrondissement. People think of it as a unique, quaint little village, located right within the city limits.

name: Lake Garda, Italy
details: If you're short on time but want to see some highlights of Lake Garda, book this 25-minute cruise and glide around the scenic Sirmione peninsula. .

name: DMount Dtna, Italyr
details: Mount Etna, or Etna, is an active stratovolcano on the east coast of Sicily, Italy, in the Metropolitan City of Catania, between the cities of Messina and Catania.

name: Amalfi Costa, Italy
details: The Amalfi Coast is a 50-kilometer stretch of coastline along the southern edge of Italy’s Sorrentine Peninsula, in the Campania region. It’s a popular holiday destination its best place for tour,

name: French Rivira, France
details: The French Riviera (or Côte d'Azur) is the Mediterranean coast of southeastern France. It includes famously glamorous beach resorts such as Saint-Tropez and Cannes.

name: Lake Geneva, France.
